title: SET_PLAYER_CAN_DO_DRIVE_BY
content:
0x6E8834B52EC20C770xF4D99685// SetPlayerCanDoDriveBy
void SET_PLAYER_CAN_DO_DRIVE_BY(Player player, BOOL toggle);Parameters:player: The player to target.toggle: If set to false, disables the players ability to do drive bys.Sets whether the player is able to do drive-bys in vehicle (shooting & aiming in vehicles), this also includes middle finger taunts.This is a toggle, it does not have to be ran every frame.
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerCanDoDriveBy
void SET_PLAYER_CAN_DO_DRIVE_BY(Player player, BOOL toggle);

local player = source
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_CAN_DO_DRIVE_BY
SetPlayerCanDoDriveBy(player, true)
